QuestData.Title: A Taste of Tirna Noch
QuestData.Description: I'm a simple mushroom with simple pleasures, $n. And what's simpler than a nice, hearty meal?$b$BDon't look so surprised. I need to eat just like anyone else! How else do you think I grew so big? Nice, tasty compost, that's how!$b$BBack in my day, I had the pick of Ardenweald for where to feed. Now, not so much.$b$BI've had a hankering for some of the loam that used to be around Tirna Noch. I haven't had shoots out there in a long time. Could you bring me some?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Leafy Loam in Tirna Noch.
QuestData.RewardText: Mmmm, it smells just like how I remember it! Maybe a little stale, but you won't hear me complaining about a job well done!
